cardData.title: MongoDB
cardData.description: MongoDB is a NoSQL database that uses a document-oriented data model designed for scalability, high performance, and high availability.

cardData.title: React.js
cardData.description: React.js is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces, developed by Facebook, that uses a virtual DOM to minimize direct manipulation of the real DOM.

cardData.title: Node.js
cardData.description: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine that allows developers to run JavaScript on the server side for scalable and high-performance web applications.

cardData.title: Express.js
cardData.description: Express.js is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides features for building single-page, multi-page, and hybrid web applications quickly.
